#Text=Ontario Votes 2007 : Interview with Green candidate Bruce Haines , Bramalea-Gore-Malton
#Text=Monday , September 24 , 2007
#Text=is running for the Green Party of Ontario in the Ontario provincial election , in the Bramalea-Gore-Malton riding .
#Text=Wikinews ' Nick Moreau interviewed him regarding his values , his experience , and his campaign .
#Text=Stay tuned for further interviews ; every candidate from every party is eligible , and will be contacted .

#Text=Expect interviews from Liberals , Progressive Conservatives , New Democratic Party members , Ontario Greens , as well as members from the Family Coalition , Freedom , Communist , Libertarian , and Confederation of Regions parties , as well as independents .
#Text=Interview
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=Why did you choose to run in this constituency ?
#Text=During the last year I have become very involved in helping my community locally on environmental issues , urban sprawl/greenspace issues and at a local food bank and soup kitchen .
#Text=A number of people noticed my efforts and suggested that I run for MPP , so I took them up on the challenge .
#Text=I chose to run in the riding where my family and I live and where my children go to school .
#Text=With two children now , and another on the way , I wanted to make sure we left behind a better world for the future generations .
#Text=What prior political experience do you have ?
#Text=What skills and insight can you bring to office , from other non-political positions you may have held ?
#Text=I have followed the political process throughout my life , and on three occasions have helped municipal candidates with their campaigns .
#Text=I have a tremendous amount of experience working in a community setting , both as a police officer and as a business owner .
#Text=I have the ability to work well with people from varying cultures , and tend to gain respect from others quickly .
#Text=Which of your competitors do you expect to pose the biggest challenge to your candidacy ?
#Text=Why ?
#Text=What makes you the most desirable of all candidates running in the riding ?
#Text=The biggest challenge will be overcoming the status quo parties , rather than the other candidates themselves .
#Text=The other parties have been around for a long time and people have developed a loyalty that is sometimes hard to overcome .
#Text=I believe I am the best candidate for my riding because I have the ability to unite our community and make it stronger .
#Text=I am a strong , vocal , active person who possesses the right leadership attributes to help the constituents in my riding .
#Text=Throughout my life I have demonstrated that I am a noticeable leader :

#Text=during my high school days I was President of the Athletic Association ; during my policing career I advanced quickly , and in business I have built up a company that employs more than 125 people and is respected in its market .
